name: Fireworks Maestro
description:
Fireworks Maestro is a VR game for mirror jam that lets you create your own fireworks show to music!

Controls:

Pick up the lighter with your right hand and the Vive controller with your left hand.

Left menu button: Bring up YouTube browser.

Right menu button: Spawn selected firework. Firework will spawn into left hand. Stake it into the ground to place it.

Left grip: With Vive controller in firework, select that firework. A small icon of the selected firework will appear on the lighter.

Right grip: Move in the direction the left Vive wand is pointing.

Right trigger: Light lighter or interact with UI.

Left touchpad: Recenter song editor.

Right touchpad: recenter fireworks box.

Gameplay video https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uAkGMbLD_Vo
